expected_result.verification: Direct pg_indexes introspection is not available via PostgREST; use psql or MCP execute_sql to confirm.
remediation: create index concurrently if not exists idx_job_parts_scheduled_start_time on public.job_parts(scheduled_start_time);
create index concurrently if not exists idx_job_parts_scheduled_end_time on public.job_parts(scheduled_end_time);
create index concurrently if not exists idx_job_parts_vendor_id on public.job_parts(vendor_id);

purpose: Verify performance indexes exist on job_parts for calendar queries
reference: See PERFORMANCE_INDEXES.md for full index plan
